title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Techniqiue: damask weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White silk damask ground; horizontal rows of lotus blossoms, with blue and silver brocaded center alternating with silver and red palmette.
